resources.string: Motorola services
Cancel
Interact with the Blur service
Needed if you want to talk to the Blur service. If missing, no communication with remote service will be possible and stuff won\'t work.
Send an email via the Blur Email Service.
Needed if you want to send an email via an Intent broadcast using the Blur Email Service. If missing, an email cannot be sent.
Send a social message via the Blur Service.
Needed if you want to send a social message via an Intent broadcast using the Blur Service. If missing, a social message cannot be sent.
Access Blur Email Service data and components.
Needed to interact with the Blur Email Service. If missing, no Social messaging database access is allowed, no Social messaging Intents will be received and no Social messaging sync requests allowed.
Access Blur Email Service data and components.
Needed to interact with the Blur Email Service. If missing, no Email Service database access is allowed, no Email Service Intents will be received and no Email Service sync requests allowed.
Blur Email Engine component.
Permission used internally by components of the Blur Email Service.
Access accounts
Needed for an application to access account information stored in the Accounts Preference Panel
Allows application to request that the device be wiped.
Allowed to request the device be wiped
Read social networking data
Allows the application to read any social networking data. Malicious applications may read personal information.
Write social networking data
Allows the application to write to the social networking database. Malicious applications may corrupt data presented to you.
Use social networking features
Allows the application to use features of a social networking provider. Malicious applications may manipulate your personal information on a social network.
Read social networking contacts
Needed if you want to read social networking contacts. If missing you cannot read social networking contacts.
Write social networking contacts
Needed if you want to write social networking contacts. If missing you cannot write or modify social networking contacts.
Schedule suggestion rule check services
Needed if you want to schedule a service to check suggestion rules.
Read contacts and groups suggestions
Needed if you want to read contacts and groups suggestions.
Write contacts and groups suggestions
Needed if you want to write data for contacts or groups suggestions.
Read general collected data
Needed if you want to read general collected user communication data.
Write general collected data
Needed if you want to write general collected user communication data.
Start IM service
Allows applications to start IM service via an intent.
Read instant messages
Allows applications to read data from the IM content provider\".
Write instant messages
Allows applications to write data to the IM content provider\".
Motorola
